tgt_original: tasmānmatimimāṃ vatsa kuru sarvajñatāptaye ||195 ||  deśanādīṃstridhālāpya bodhicittaṃ tato guruḥ |
sarvakarmakṛtārakṣya dhyāyāddhṛtkaṇṭhamūrddhasu |  vajramabjaṃ tathā cakraṃ hū āḥ om teṣu vinyaset ||197 ||
hṛcchiraḥ kaṇṭhamālabhya dadyātpuṣpādikaṃ kramāt ||198 ||  puṣpaṃ mūrdhni puro dhūpaṃ dīpaṃ gandhaṃ punarhṛdi |
kimutānantayaśasāṃ mantracaryānaye sthitaḥ |  padaṃ hyanuttaraṃ yāti japanvai mantra(ntraṃ) tāyinām ||206 ||
ucchinnā durgati steṣāṃ sarvaduḥkhasya sambhavā |  yeṣāṃ caryāvare hyasminmatiratyantanirmalā ||207 ||
yena yūyaṃ jinaiḥ sarvaiḥ saputrairiha śāsane ||208 ||  sarve parigṛhītāḥ stha jāyamānā mahātmabhiḥ |
prāgudaṅmukhasaṃsthaistaiḥ khādayitvaiva prakṣipet |  gocarmamātrabhū lipte siddhiṃ śāntyādikāṃ diśet ||201 ||
bodhicittaṃ na vai tyājyaṃ yadvajramiti mudrayā |
saddharmo na pratikṣepyo na ca tyājyaḥ kadācana |
ajñānādvātha mohādvā na vai vivṛṇuyāt sa tu ||386 ||
adya mārān vinirjitya praviṣṭāḥ paramaṃ puram |
jagati laghusukhe'dya vajrasattva-  pratisamaśāśvatatāṃ gatā bhavantaḥ ||398 ||
adya vaḥ saphalaṃ janma yadasmin supratiṣṭhitāḥ |
om gha gha ghātaya ghātaya sarvaduṣṭān phaṭ kīlaya kīlaya sarvapāpān phaṭ hū hū hū vajra kīla[ya] vajradhara ājñāpayati kāyavākcittavajra kīlaya hū phaṭ |
adhaḥ śūlordhvavighnāriṃ dhiyā madhye prakīlayet |  vighnaughān ghātayet sarvān daśadiksaṃvyavasthitān ||163 ||
dviguṇīkṛtya tatsūtraṃ cakramadhyeṣu dhārya ca |  cakrākāraṃ tato bāhyaṃ vajrasutradvayaṃ punaḥ ||227 ||  aiśānyāṃ cakravāḍaṃ ca svānupūrvyā pradakṣiṇāt |
animittairasiddhiḥ syāt sūtracchede guroḥ kṣayaḥ |  hīnātiriktato rogā diṅmohe śiṣyavibhramaḥ ||229 ||
